title: A few uncommon/interesting Postcards for sale
author: Greenmonster

posts.post_title: A few uncommon/interesting Postcards for sale
posts.post_content:
A couple of interesting postcards for sale as priced/OBO.  Payment via PayPal F&F or check/MO.  Thank you.  Jim

Shibe Park exterior view, produced H.M. Rose, the most difficult commercially produced postcard of Shibe Park to find.  

Bayside Park, 1913 NE League Opening Day Postcard view 

Real Photo Postcard (EKC Back) Honolulu Stadium, Joe DiMaggio at bat, 7th Army Air Force vs Navy, 1944. 

Cy Young with Hunting Dogs

Ted Williams Advertising (facsimile signature) for his custom build fishing tackle 

1955 Fenway Park postcard (Williams batting, Feller pitching) sent from Baseball Hall of Famer Ernie Harwell to Wirt Gammon,

All of the postcards above are moving to Ebay tomorrow night, 5:20 PM PST start......Ebay ID - Greenmonster..........all lots starting at $9.99

Also adding an additional 25 postcards including these:

C1920 Baseball Game Postcard Fayal Island Portugal Azores

Ted Williams Boston Red Sox Baseball Postcard Advertising for Baseball Camp

C1921 Babe Ruth New York Yankees Baseball Real Photo Postcard Societe Anonyme

C1920 Cleveland Indians Baseball Stadium Postcard League Park

1913 Ohio University Athens Athletic Field Baseball Stadium Postcard Real Photo
I’ll purchase the Honolulu Stadium and the Cy Young cards, please.
